评论概述: This isn’t anything like the picture

评论概述: The quality is terrible: seller reached out and made it right!
评论详情: This isn’t hood lie like at all. The material is uncomfortable, cheap, and not your average hoodie. I was very disappointed that it didn’t look like the picture as well. The return was an easy process.  Update on my purchase as the seller reached out and sent me a much better quality hoodie than the first one I received. The outside isn’t soft, but the inside definitely is. I enjoyed the new and improved hoodie. I wish I would have sized down but the takeaway from this is the seller made it right by sending me a better version.
